scripts.install: cd ./core & npm install & cd ./../api & npm install & cd ./../web & npm install
scripts.start: concurrently "gulp --cwd ./core ts & gulp --cwd ./api ts & node ./api/app.js" "cd ./web & ng serve --port 8084"
scripts.build-prod: gulp build & cd ./core & npm run build-prod & cd ./../api & npm run build-prod & cd ./../web & npm run build-prod & cd ./../mysql & npm run build-prod
